instructions.name: cpi_proxy
docs: Only accessible by integration programs

instructions.name: link_mint_to_state
docs: For glam mint program's use only

instructions.name: price_drift_users
docs: Extra accounts for pricing N drift users under the same user stats:
- user_stats x 1
- drift_user x N
- markets and oracles used by all drift users (no specific order)

instructions.name: price_drift_vault_depositors
docs: Extra accounts for pricing N vault depositors:
- (vault_depositor, drift_vault, drift_user) x N
- spot_market used by drift users of vaults (no specific order)
- perp markets used by drift users of vaults (no specific order)
- oracles of spot markets and perp markets (no specific order)

instructions.name: price_kamino_vault_shares
docs: Price Kamino vault shares.
- `num_vaults` Number of kamino vaults to price.
Extra accounts for pricing N kamino vault shares:
- (kvault_share_ata, kvault_share_mint, kvault_state, kvault_deposit_token_oracle) x N
- reserve x M
- M = number of reserves used by all kvaults' allocations
- reserve pubkeys must follow the same order of reserves used by each allocation

instructions.name: price_vault_tokens
docs: Price vault SOL balance and tokens it holds.
Extra accounts for pricing N tokens:
- (ata, mint, oracle) x N

errors.name: CannotApplyChanges
errors.msg: Pending changes cannot be applied due to unfulfilled subscriptions or redemptions

errors.name: AssetNotBorrowable
errors.msg: Asset is not allowed to borrow

errors.name: InvalidAccountOwner
errors.msg: Account owned by an invalid program

errors.name: CannotCloseState
errors.msg: Glam state cannot be closed, all mints must be closed first

errors.name: InvalidRemainingAccounts
errors.msg: Invalid accounts: the transaction is malformed

errors.name: MissingAccount
errors.msg: An account required by the instruction is missing

errors.name: WithdrawDenied
errors.msg: Withdraw denied. Only vaults allow withdraws (funds and mints don't)

errors.name: InvalidStableCoinPriceForSubscribe
errors.msg: Subscription not allowed: invalid stable coin price

errors.name: ExternalPositionsNotPriced
errors.msg: Not all external vault accounts are priced

errors.name: VaultAssetsNotPriced
errors.msg: Not all vault assets are priced

errors.name: InvalidQuoteSpotMarket
errors.msg: Unsupported spot market for perp quotes

errors.name: LockUp
errors.msg: Policy violation: lock-up has not expired

fields.name: admin
docs: The authority that can modify the config

fields.name: fee_authority
docs: The authority that can modify fee structure of individual glam state
and claim protocol fees

types.name: IntegrationAcl
docs: An integration program can have multiple protocols supported.
Enabled protocols are stored in a bitmask, and each protocol can have its own policy.

types.name: ProtocolPermissions
docs: Represents a delegate's permissions for a specific protocol

types.name: ProtocolPolicy
docs: Stores policy data for an integrated protocol.
Integration programs serialize/deserialize this data.
